alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 10:00PM CDT until September 26 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON COUNTY... At 1000 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cedar Hill, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Arnold, Byrnes Mill, Cedar Hill, Barnhart, Antonia, High Ridge, Oakville, House Springs, Imperial, Scotsdale, Kimmswick, and Otto. This also includes Mastodon Historic Site and Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 185 and 190. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
